title: if a reader of Pipe dead what will happen
body:
by **liuqinglai137**: 
I,m leaning golang and reading the source code.
but there is a puzzle about the pipe.
============================================
r,w = io.Pipe()
go reader(r)
n,er = w.Write(data)
if er != nil {
   //log error and exit
}
=============================================
I wondered what will happen if a reader of  a pipe dead.
If the write will wait all the time?
you see when the resource is limited the go reader will failed and what can 
do to avoid a forever waiting of the writer(the main goroutines).

and the same I didn't find some try catch mechanism and what can I do when 
an "Exception" occur.
